name: pgadmin
tagline: A web based administration tool for PostgreSQL
description: pgAdmin is a popular web-based GUI for managing PostgreSQL databases. It includes advanced tools to create, query, monitor, and maintain databases in a self-hosted or cloud environment.

features.title: Database Management
features.description: Create, modify, and delete PostgreSQL databases with a graphical interface

features.title: Visual Query Builder
features.description: Construct complex SQL queries using drag-and-drop interface without writing code

features.title: Data Editing
features.description: View and modify table data directly in spreadsheet-like grids with inline editing

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Schedule and manage database backups with support for pg_dump and pg_restore

features.title: User Management
features.description: Administer database users, roles, and permissions through intuitive dialogs

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Track query execution, connection statistics, and server metrics in real-time
